articles.title: Do you have a 'salt tooth'? How to recognise it – and feed your cravings healthily - The Guardian
articles.description: We all know what a sweet tooth is, but some people also hanker for salt. Here’s what to do if you can’t stop dreaming of crisps
articles.content: Is there any such thing as a salt tooth? We are familiar with a sweet tooth, and sugar cravings, along with the negative effects of those. We are broadly aware of the downsides of too much salt, incl… [+4879 chars]
